channel.title: Need help with 508 basics
channel.description:
Hey, I just started with 508 servers but im only able to do the basics of the basics atm(creating commands changine tele's moving npc's etc...) I still have some questions... hopefully you can help me with this :)?
BASE: mezzy-scape
1. how do i change the pvp drops? 2. how do i change the items in the shops? 3.where can i find the exp rate of training?
and err that's it ^^. Well thanks for atleast looking :).
PS: (sorry still a noob and im rubish at english)
